name: Finger-based Pulse and Health Monitoring System
about: Utilizes IR light to non-invasively measure SpO2 and blood pressure. Uses TCRT1000 IR sensor with MCU and ESP32 for processing and wireless transmission.

name: Artificial Heart Prototype
about: Simulates the pumping action of a human artificial heart jarvik 7.

name: Biohealth tracker and reminder
about: A biomedical health trackr and reminder app built using online HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. feature real -time vitual monitor,medication reminder aler,and user-friendlly health data visualization.
